welcome_message_body: Welcome to Aruja, Brazil! Whether you're here to experience the city's beautiful nature, vibrant culture, or delicious cuisine, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Aruja has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Aeroporto Internacional Guarulhos, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Aeroporto Internacional Guarulhos, mainly used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Aeroporto Internacional Guarulhos, used for both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sao Jose Dos Campos Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
